text:
(a)     "Charitable trust departments" means those departments so designated in Charter section 
5.101.
     (b)     "City" means the City and County of San Francisco.
     (c)     "Entertainment-related permits, as defined by ordinance" means those permits and licenses as defined in Administrative Code section 
90.2 as amended from time to time. 
(Added by Ord. 9-09, File No. 081125, App. 1/16/2009)
